name: bostonSubwayCompanionAPI
description: Wicked awesome boston subway companion app API
author: nils backe <nils.backe@gmail.com>

scripts.zipuploaddevelop: tsc && zip -r ./boston-subway-companion-api-develop.zip * && find . -name "*.js" -type f -delete && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name arn:aws:lambda:us-east-1:455170633390:function:bostonSubwayCompanionAPI --zip-file fileb://boston-subway-companion-api-develop.zip
scripts.zipuploadprod-v1: tsc && zip -r ./boston-subway-companion-api-prod-v1.zip * && find . -name "*.js" -type f -delete && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name arn:aws:lambda:us-east-1:455170633390:function:bostonSubwayCompanionAPI-prod --zip-file fileb://boston-subway-companion-api-prod-v1.zip
scripts.zipuploadprod-v2: tsc && zip -r ./boston-subway-companion-api-prod-v2.zip * && find . -name "*.js" -type f -delete && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name arn:aws:lambda:us-east-1:455170633390:function:bostonSubwayCompanionAPI-v2 --zip-file fileb://boston-subway-companion-api-prod-v2.zip
